features: Innovative Adult Mouthwash: SmartMouth Original Activated Mouthwash utilizes patented Zinc Ion Technology for optimal oral care
Bad Breath Mouthwash: Our oral rinse targets sulfur gas, so you can enjoy fresh breath that lasts 24 hours
Mint Mouthwash for Fresh Breath: Our original mouthwash features a refreshing, long-lasting, fresh mint flavor for all-day results
Oral Care Mouthwash Without Alcohol: SmartMouth mouthwash is alcohol-free and paraben-free, providing a comfortable rinse without any stinging or burning sensations
SmartMouth Satisfaction Guarantee: SmartMouth offers a 60-day satisfaction guarantee, providing peace of mind with your oral care purchase

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SmartMouth Dry Mouth Dual-Action Mints contain zinc to promote a healthier mouth and xylitol, a saliva stimulant. These mild mints can be used any time of day for temporary relief of minor dry mouth. SmartMouth Dry Mouth Mints work quickly to temporarily relieve discomfort associated with minor dry mouth. They can be used any time of day or night so you don’t have to worry about minor dry mouth. SmartMouth Dry Mouth Mints are safe for those with Xerostomia and Sjögren’s Syndrome. SmartMouth mints are sugarless, so you won't have to worry about the effects of excess sugar on your teeth. They are sweetened with Xylitol, for a naturally sweet flavor. SmartMouth Dry Mouth Mints come in a convenient, resealable pocket pack so you can temporarily relieve the discomfort of minor dry mouth, anytime, anywhere!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best travel mouthwash
reviews.reviewText: These are PERFECT for travel. They take up no space and work great. I always carry one in my purse, leave a few in my desk at work and of course pack some in a trip. Not only does the formula work great, but their portability is my favorite. I can count out exactly how many I need for any travel or situation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does what it says
reviews.reviewText: It does what it says. This stuff won’t really leave your mouth minty fresh but it kills any bad odors. It’s like it’s job is to kill the bad odor and not just to cover it up with this overwhelming minty taste that doesn’t last. This product last for probably 10 hours at a time. Coffee and garlic will weaken its power. I normally only use it during the daytime but I was curious if it would work overnight so I tried that one time. My breath wasn’t perfect the next morning but it was much much better than it normally is. Wonderful for travel and so convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THIS PRODUCT
reviews.reviewText: YES this is not the least expensive mouthwash on the market. But if you want a real product that REALLY does work this is your product. I hate hate hate bad breath on myself or anyone I am around. ESPECIALLY morning breath between you and your significant other. This product is incredible. Each of you use it prior to bed and in the morning each of you will have perfect breath. Use it before going out for the night and entire evening your breath is fresh and non offensive. I have used this for at least 5 years and was grateful when the company created the travel package. I use them every day.. And my dentist says I have the healthiest teeth and gums and attributed it 100% to my brushing, water pic, and Smart Mouth habits. I will always use this product if it remains available. Thank you for being a perfect product for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I gave SMARTMOUTH in the duo pump bottles to all on my Xmas 2022 list. All recipients said it was “hands down, the best-ever mouthwash of [their] lives.” The recipients also travel for business, pleasure & do mid-day speaking engagements. These travel sized packets are IDEAL to tuck in a pocket or satchel! Yesterday, a friend told me she gave her daughter travel packets for her daughter to use on a week-long business trip to VietNam. These are a “necessity” NOT a “luxury”. Stock up - you’ll use them- colleagues will note your fresh mouth & suddenly you’ll either hoard or (as I prefer) share & introduce with others! This is a win-win item!Note to Amazon: the manufacturer offers a larger quantity- sadly, the mfgr does not ship to my zip code, so I’m stuck with Amazon’s offers of 3 packs. Please offer the larger quantity of travel, one-time use packets! Thank you!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: The best whrn travelling. Very convinient and easy to use. Been using it on my travels this past months and ive been so happy . Feels good when used. I feel like my breath is really fresh. I smoke so i am very conscious with my breath. This gives me so much confident. I brush my teeth thrice if not twice a day together with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pricey but good for travel
reviews.reviewText: Like the other reviewers, I thought these were a bit pricey, but they do travel well. It's difficult to tear open the tab wide enough for the mouthwash to flow freely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy to have found the travel version
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Smart mouth , mouth wash for years. It is by far the best. I have been looking for travel packs for a long time and so happy to finally find them on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has helped A LOT.
reviews.reviewText: This has changed things for me. I went to the dentist after a year and a half due to COVID on July 1st and it appears that my gingivitis reversed and I’m so happy. I no longer have to stand away from people, cover my mouth or turn my head away from them when talking due to bad breath. I’ve been using it for at least a year now but I noticed the difference in my breath almost immediately. It’s not even detectable in the morning. I enjoy this Be sure to brush twice a day and floss daily you know the basics any dentist will tell you.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well but very expensive and slow to ship
reviews.reviewText: Smart mouth products are excellent but the travel packages are slow to ship (to Canada) and expensive.

reviews.reviewTitle: I need the product bc the dentist ordered jt
reviews.reviewText: Too expensive .. I need it for traveling

Would recommend this to anyone who suffers from chronic breath problems. My wife says it's miraculous!! Too bad it isn't available by the bottle for shipping to Canada. I go down to Washington now to purchase it 3 or 4 bottles at a time. Good seller as well, always quick delivery.
Your breath stay fresh for hours !!

reviews.reviewTitle: Awesome small enough to fit in my purse
reviews.reviewText: Awesome small enough to fit in my purse, for travelling and I used this product before it works keeping your breathe fresh the zinc in this product kills bacteria that cause bad breathe so I feel confident using this stuff its my go to stuff
